Greetings!

Hello There!!                                                                                                                                                                                                 Welcome to my blog, Trampled Terra-Traveler in Trouble!!                                                                                                 My on-line name is Grime J. I just began studying programming in 3~4 month ago.                                      So, I’m not beginner class, yet. I don’t have fund, stamina, knowledgement, intelligence,                               but I just have passion, and fun when I’m studying.

Currently, I’m intereted with

  1. What can I do? (As a Job)
  2. What can I do? (As a Hobby)
  3. What can I do? (AS a One)

I’m not fluent natural(include my mother-language, korean) & computer language, both.                      So, This blog is not helpful for many senior programmers.                                                                                                  I use this blog just for logging my code, and for someone just like me.                                                                        If you want to contact me, Please send e-mail to me.
